title: Item set taken out of the beta client?
body: Hey just wondering if anyone could help me find the item set or the confirm that rito took the item set build out of the client if so why did they take such a great thing ???

replies.body: Not taken out, just not been implemented yet. In the meantime you can still use item sets created in the legacy client.
Simply no one used them and everyone said they didnt care if rito had them or not.
